skdetail:

Invocation Name: income tax
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to know your Income Tax? Ask Income Tax Calculator by saying, "Alexa, Tell Income Tax to calculate Tax"
Using the Income Tax Calculator skill, you can calculate the estimated amount of Tax on your Income in 4 simple steps. Income Tax Calculator is a useful tool for salaried persons and businessmen to know their income tax payable to Government.
Income Tax Calculator skill is aimed in providing a rough estimate of income tax in India for the financial year 2018-19.
Enable the Income Tax skill on your Alexa Device just by saying, "Enable Income Tax"

Start using the Income Tax skill by saying any of the following, 
"Alexa, open Income Tax"
"Alexa, tell Income Tax to calculate Tax"
"Alexa, ask Income Tax to calculate my Income Tax"

Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.

So now leave behind your CAs and CPAs, enable Income Tax Calculator to try a new smarter way for filing Income Tax
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
